title: President Donald J. Trump Is Working to Expand Opportunity and Prosperity for African Americans – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
February 21, 2019
We’re fighting to give every American—all over the country, every single American—a future of dignity and purpose and of pride.PROMOTING OPPORTUNITY AND PROSPERITY: President Trump’s pro-growth economic agenda is creating more economic prosperity and opportunity for all Americans.TRANSFORMING OUR JUSTICE SYSTEM: President Trump signed historic bipartisan criminal justice reform that made our justice system fairer.  PRIORITIZING EDUCATION: President Trump has made supporting our Nation’s Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCUs) and school choice priorities for his Administration.
